abyss_battalion.effect_text: when played: the game turn after this, running the blockade costs you 2 orders.
abyss_battalion.name: abyss_battalion

all_hands_on_deck.name: all_hands_on_deck

anchross_aweigh.effect_text: while at sea the pirates on the ship opposite this one are all brought back to their base firepower (+x count as +0 in this case).
anchross_aweigh.name: anchross_aweigh

anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.effect_text: while at sea at the start of your turn, you may choose to give up your free draw in exchange for an extra order.
anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades.name: anemone_silver_of_the_dozen_blades

apoc_ko1_lypse.name: apoc_ko1_lypse

arg_angel.effect_text: when played if you have no other pirates at sea, then you may free play a pirate from your davy jones' locker
arg_angel.name: arg_angel

super_barrel_soldier.effect_text: WHEN PLAYED this Pirate gets a permanent +5 for every friendly Pirate destroyed in the preceding Game Turn.
super_barrel_soldier.name: super_barrel_soldier

avian_airship.effect_text: As long as this Ship does not have a Completed Crew it cannot be Sunk by a player Firing the Cannons.
avian_airship.name: avian_airship

ba_ba_buccaneer.effect_text: when played you may either search your poop deck for a “sword” pirate and bring it to your hand or give one friendly pirate who is not a “sword” +3.
ba_ba_buccaneer.name: ba_ba_buccaneer

barfrogamew_hops.effect_text: if you've boarded three pirates this turn, then yo umay free play this card.
barfrogamew_hops.name: barfrogamew_hops

bionic_blowfish_blader.effect_text: when played you may choose to destroy another friendly pirate at sea. if you do, this pirate gains a permanent +6.
bionic_blowfish_blader.name: bionic_blowfish_blader

bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.effect_text: when played you may either bring an “equip to” shanty from your poop deck to your hand or you may free play one from your hand.
bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane.name: bluesmith_of_ocean_end_lane

boatload_buster.effect_text: every time a heavy metal (grey) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
boatload_buster.name: boatload_buster

bootstrap_berserker.effect_text: while at sea when this card has a hidden shanty or “equip” card attached to it, it gets x2.
bootstrap_berserker.name: bootstrap_berserker

briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer.effect_text: while at sea, at the start of each turn if the ship this pirate is on has the most firepower of any ship at sea (friendly or not), gain a bonus order.
briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer.name: briney_deep_prehistoric_privateer

bring_me_that_horizon.effect_text: play the top card in either player' davy jones’ locker.
bring_me_that_horizon.name: bring_me_that_horizon

broadsidosaurus.effect_text: When played if this is the card to complete a crew, instead of firing the cannons, you immediately get a free search for the treasure. Before firepower is calculated, sink this ship.
broadsidosaurus.name: broadsidosaurus

bumble_smee.effect_text: While this card is in your hand, you may set it aside at the end of your turn. Until the start of your next turn, if your opponent(s) play any Pirate with greater Firepower than this card then you may immediately Free Play this card. If they do not, you must spend an Order to play it as soon as able.
bumble_smee.name: bumble_smee

calculegend.effect_text: boarding restriction: you may only board this pirate on a ship if the cumulative points on that ship will be a prime number (once played).
calculegend.name: calculegend

cannon_boo.effect_text:
surprise you may free play this card when your opponent is sending a volley. prevent a ship from sinking. if played this way, this card is a +4.

*only 3 surprise cards allowed per poop deck.
cannon_boo.name: cannon_boo

cannon_bully.effect_text: SURPRISE! Can Free Play on your turn (as long as its Ship is not empty). If destroyed at the end of the Player Turn. *Only 3 SURPRISE! Cards allowed per Poop Deck.
cannon_bully.name: cannon_bully

cannon_floof.effect_text: WHEN PLAYED take the top card of your Poop Deck and Free Play it (you cannot play another Pirate via card effect for the rest of the player turn).
cannon_floof.name: cannon_floof

cannonball_cruiser.effect_text:
all boom (red) pirates on this ship get +5.

send a volley: when fourth pirate boards this ship, immediately send a volley without costing an order.

captain_lazerbeard.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA this card gets +2 for every Pirate in your Davy Jones' Locker.
captain_lazerbeard.name: captain_lazerbeard

caskmaster.effect_text: you may play this card as if it was a hidden shanty. upon revealing it, immediately board it on a friendly ship with space (any card that targets this card to destroy a shanty, instead forces it to reveal itself).

coast_cutter.effect_text: all deep sea (blue) pirates on this ship get +5.

coco_cannon.effect_text: all tropical (orange) pirates on this ship get +5.
coco_cannon.name: coco_cannon

coconaut.effect_text: when played (with an order), search your poop deck for another “coconaut” card. it may immediately board this ship without costing an order (space allowing).
coconaut.name: coconaut

confused_crew.effect_text: Equip to a Ship. The next three Pirates your opponent plays get boarded on the Ship of your choosing (following boarding rules, including that it needs to be one of theirs).
confused_crew.name: confused_crew

crows_nest_coffee.name: crows_nest_coffee

crustacean_carrier.name: crustacean_carrier

cycloptus.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA at the start of your turn destroy all of this pirate's Shipmates.

dagger_of_the_deep.effect_text: discard two cards. Then, equip to a pirate (friendly or not). this pirate’s firepower is now inverted.
dagger_of_the_deep.name: dagger_of_the_deep

davy_jones_abomination.name: davy_jones_abomination

SURPRISE! When one of your Ships would be Sunk, you may prevent it from sinking by discarding the top 10 cards from your Poop Deck. You may then Free Play one of the discarded cards.

*Only 3 SURPRISE! Cards allowed per Poop Deck.
deal_with_the_broadside_devil.name: deal_with_the_broadside_devil

deckstroyer_mk_iii.name: deckstroyer_mk_iii

surprise you may free play this card when your opponent is sending a volley. destroy two friendly pirates. your ship is not destroyed, instead send a volley at one of your opponent’s ships. 

*only 3 surprise cards allowed per poop deck.
disrupting_fundamental_laws_of_cannonbal.name: disrupting_fundamental_laws_of_cannonball_physics

doctor_croctor.effect_text: when played return one card from your davy jones’ locker to your hand.
doctor_croctor.name: doctor_croctor

doombeards_cutlass.effect_text: Equip to a Ship. Remove one pirate from that Ship and set it off to the side of the Ship. The Pirate's effect is ignored, but its printed firepower counts towards your total Firepower. This card can only be destroyed if "Doombeard's Cutlass" is destroyed or via High Tide.

feather_flotilla.effect_text: every time a tropical (orange) pirate boards this ship, draw a card.
feather_flotilla.name: feather_flotilla

fleet_phoenix.name: fleet_phoenix

flintlock_fury.effect_text: when played if your opponent has more pirates at sea than you, you may destroy one enemy pirate.
flintlock_fury.name: flintlock_fury

flotsamstein.name: flotsamstein

skull_of_the_shipasaurus.name: skull_of_the_shipasaurus

spectral_dutchman.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA this card can only be sent to DJL by High Tide. Any other time it would be destroyed it instead keeps its position and gains a permanent x2.
spectral_dutchman.name: spectral_dutchman

spinnaker_spud.effect_text: at the start of each of your turns (after this card is revealed) where there are no pirates aboard this ship, draw an extra card
spinnaker_spud.name: spinnaker_spud

sponge_barbarian.effect_text: Boarding restriction: you need at least five friendly pirates at sea
sponge_barbarian.name: sponge_barbarian

stinger_class_jelly_frigate.effect_text: when this ship sets sail, your opponent must reveal their hand to you.
stinger_class_jelly_frigate.name: stinger_class_jelly_frigate

subject_s3a_zku11.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA if this pirate's ship is exhausted, all friendly pirates that share this pirate's ship position get x2.
subject_s3a_zku11.name: subject_s3a_zku11

sunrise_supplies.effect_text: draw back up to having five cards in your hand.
sunrise_supplies.name: sunrise_supplies

sword_bay_salvager.effect_text: any pirates with when played effects that board this ship activate their effect a second time at the end of the turn and then are destroyed.
sword_bay_salvager.name: sword_bay_salvager

teachs_ticking_time_bomb.effect_text: when this card is played, shuffle it into your opponent’s deck. the next time either player draws a “teach’s ticking time bomb” that player’s opponent immediately sinks one of that player’s ships.
teachs_ticking_time_bomb.name: teachs_ticking_time_bomb

terror_of_the_seas_tater.effect_text: Board this card on an opponent's Ship. At the start of each turn the controlling player checks the bottom of their Poop Deck. If it's a Shanty this card and all Shipmates are destroyed. If it's not then that player may forgo their Free Draw in order to move it to an opponent's Ship.
terror_of_the_seas_tater.name: terror_of_the_seas_tater

the_art_of_marooning.effect_text: this card may be free played from you hand when either player successfully runs the blockade. pick one pirate (friendly or not) that would have been destroyed after the blockade run and return it on a new ship on your following turn.
the_art_of_marooning.name: the_art_of_marooning

the_bladeheim.effect_text: when this ship completes a crew, gain one extra order.
the_bladeheim.name: the_bladeheim

the_deckrunner.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA if you fail a Search for the Treasure, before Reconciliation, gain an extra Order.
the_deckrunner.name: the_deckrunner

the_grand_old_seaworth.effect_text: when your opponent boards a pirate on the ship opposite this one, you may immediately free play a pirate from your hand. then flip this card face down. it now counts as a normal boom ship.
the_grand_old_seaworth.name: the_grand_old_seaworth

the_greater_sand_witch.effect_text: while at sea this pirate gets +2 for every shanty in your davy jones’ locker.
the_greater_sand_witch.name: the_greater_sand_witch

the_icemoor.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA if a friendly Ship is Sunk, you may choose for the cards aboard to remain, filling the space with the next Ship in your Shipyard. Once this card is destroyed all saved cards are immediately destroyed too.
the_icemoor.name: the_icemoor

the_legendary_flamighydra.effect_text: while at sea this card gets +5 for every ship in your ship graveyard.
the_legendary_flamighydra.name: the_legendary_flamighydra

the_legendary_octdent.effect_text: equip to a pirate. it gets +8
the_legendary_octdent.name: the_legendary_octdent

the_mapillion_vi.effect_text: anytime you start your player turn and this ship has a complete crew, gain a bonus order that turn.
the_mapillion_vi.name: the_mapillion_vi

the_oldest_sea_shanty.effect_text: cancel the effect of and destroy a shanty.
the_oldest_sea_shanty.name: the_oldest_sea_shanty

the_plankwalker.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are juju, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.
the_plankwalker.name: the_plankwalker

the_seastress.effect_text: when played pick one pirate at sea (friendly or not). that pirate permanently loses their effect and this card gains it (activate this effect as if this was just played).
the_seastress.name: the_seastress

the_ship_rex.effect_text: boarding restriction: costs 2 orders. at the end of your turn destroy all pirates on the ship this boards, unless they are boom, then you may instead board them on any open spaces on your other ships.
the_ship_rex.name: the_ship_rex

the_squall_skiff_squad.effect_text: this ship starts exhausted. when this ship is played, you may immediately board a pirate on it (without costing an order).
the_squall_skiff_squad.name: the_squall_skiff_squad

the_sunken_crown.effect_text: When played and after each Order, this card equips itself to the Pirate at Sea with the highest available Firepower. It remains on a tie or if unable to move. After played, each subsequent time it equips to a new Pirate, that player gets a bonus Order. This card is only destroyed during High Tide.
the_sunken_crown.name: the_sunken_crown

the_vacation_demon.effect_text: when played both players shuffle their hands back into their poop decks and draw that many cards.
the_vacation_demon.name: the_vacation_demon

topgallant_knight.effect_text: while at sea all pirates on the ship this pirate is on cannot be destroyed, moved or returned to your hand directly by card effects.
topgallant_knight.name: topgallant_knight

toucan_trader.effect_text: WHEN PLAYED you may either draw two cards or search your Poop Deck for a Pirate and bring it to your hand.
toucan_trader.name: toucan_trader

treasuratops.effect_text: when played draw a card and draw 1 additional card at the start of each of your turns.
treasuratops.name: treasuratops

tree_house_hullentine.effect_text: once per game turn, when a pirate with no effect boards this ship, gain an extra order.
tree_house_hullentine.name: tree_house_hullentine

tricorn_of_dawn.effect_text: cannot be played as a hidden shanty. when this card is played, swap one friendly pirate at sea with one of your opponent’s pirates (no boarding effects activate).
tricorn_of_dawn.name: tricorn_of_dawn

truest_aim.effect_text: cannot be played as a hidden shanty. destroy one pirate at sea.
truest_aim.name: truest_aim

unkillable_kiwi_krew.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA all of this Pirate's Shipmates have their base Firepower changed to the number of cards in your DJL.
unkillable_kiwi_krew.name: unkillable_kiwi_krew

urchin_virus_ultra.effect_text: equip to a ship. all of your opponent’s pirates with firepower over +4 now get brought down to +4 (after any effects are factored in).
urchin_virus_ultra.name: urchin_virus_ultra

wave_in_a_bottle.effect_text: when played exhaust one of your opponent’s ships.
wave_in_a_bottle.name: wave_in_a_bottle

weredolphin.effect_text: WHILE AT SEA unless there are more Shanties/Hidden Shanties at sea (friendly or not) than the number of this Pirate's Shipmates, this card is a +0.
weredolphin.name: weredolphin

ye_olde_ferry_fox.effect_text: SURPRISE! While this is in your hand, when one of your Pirates is destroyed, you may bring it to your hand and Board this card onto a friendly Ship. *Only 3 SURPRISE! Cards allowed per Poop Deck.
ye_olde_ferry_fox.name: ye_olde_ferry_fox

zombuoy.effect_text: when destroyed, during your next turn, board this pirate on a friendly ship.
zombuoy.name: zombuoy
